institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Ministry of Employment and Labor's Consignment Project Subsidy Processing Rules/Article 5 (Director of Account Deposit)
contents: Article 5 (Director of Account Deposit) The head of the affiliated organization may designate up to five persons responsible for account deposit from among employees at the level of manager or higher. However, if the person in charge of account deposit is unable to perform account deposit duties for more than one day due to a business trip, vacation, etc., the next-lowest employee may be designated as an agent for the person in charge of account deposit for a fixed period of time.
